Deus meus rēx: et laudābō nōmen tuum in saeculum
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: et in saeculum saeculī. ^ Every day will I bless thee
et in saeculum saeculī. ^ I will extol: and I will praise thy name for ever

Deus meus rēx: et laudābilis nimis
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: et magnitūdinis ejus nōn est fīnis. ^ Great is the Lord
O God my king: and of his greatness there is no end.

1 ^ Exaltābō tē: 4 ^ Generātiō et generātiō laudābit opera tua
Deus meus rēx: et potentiam tuam prōnūntiābunt. ^ Generation and generation shall praise thy works
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: and they shall declare thy power.

Deus meus rēx: et mīrābilia tua narrābunt. ^ They shall speak of the magnificence of the glory of thy holiness
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: and shall tell thy wondrous works.

Deus meus rēx: et magnitūdinem tuam narrābunt. ^ And they shall speak of the might of thy terrible acts
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: and shall declare thy greatness.

Deus meus rēx: et jūstitia tua exsultābunt. ^ They shall publish the memory of the abundance of thy sweetness
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: and shall rejoice in thy justice.

Deus meus rēx: et multum misericors. ^ The Lord is gracious and merciful; patient
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: and plenteous in mercy.

Deus meus rēx: et miserātiōnēs ejus super omnia opera ejus. ^ The Lord is sweet to all
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: and his tender mercies are over all his works.

Deus meus rēx: Domine
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: omnia opera tua
et in saeculum saeculī. ^ I will extol: et sānctī tuī benedīcant tibī. ^ Let all thy works
and let thy saints bless thee.

Deus meus rēx: et potentiam tuam loquentur
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: ^ They shall speak of the glory of thy kingdom
et in saeculum saeculī. ^ I will extol: and shall tell of thy power

1 ^ Exaltābō tē: 12 ^ ut nōtam faciant fīliīs hominum potentiam tuam
Deus meus rēx: et glōriam magnificentiae regnī tuī. ^ to make known to the sons of men thy might
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: and the glory of the magnificence of thy kingdom.

Deus meus rēx: et dominātiō tua in omnī generātiōne et generātiōnem. ^ Thy kingdom is a kingdom of all ages
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: and thy dominion endureth throughout all generations.

1 ^ Exaltābō tē: 14 ^ Fidēlis Dominus in omnibus verbīs suīs
Deus meus rēx: et sānctus in omnibus operibus suīs. ^ The Lord is faithful in all his words
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: and holy in all his works.

Deus meus rēx: quī corruunt
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: et ērigit omnēs ēlīsōs. ^ The Lord lifteth up all that fall
et in saeculum saeculī. ^ I will extol: and setteth up all that are cast down.

Deus meus rēx: Domine
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: et tū dās ēscam illōrum in tempore opportūnō. ^ The eyes of all hope in thee
O God my king: and thou givest them meat in due season.

Deus meus rēx: et implēs omne animal benedictiōne. ^ Thou openest thy hand
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: and fillest with blessing every living creature.

1 ^ Exaltābō tē: 18 ^ Jūstus Dominus in omnibus viīs suīs
Deus meus rēx: et sānctus in omnibus operibus suīs. ^ The Lord is just in all his ways
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: and holy in all his works.

1 ^ Exaltābō tē: 19 ^ Prope est Dominus omnibus invocantibus eum
Deus meus rēx: omnibus invocantibus eum in vēritāte. ^ The Lord is nigh unto all them that call upon him
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: to all that call upon him in truth.

Deus meus rēx: et dēprecātiōnem eōrum exaudiet
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: et salvōs faciet eōs. ^ He will do the will of them that fear him
et in saeculum saeculī. ^ I will extol: and he will hear their prayer

Deus meus rēx: et omnēs peccātōrēs disperdet. ^ The Lord keepeth all them that love him
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: but all the wicked he will destroy.

Deus meus rēx: et benedīcat omnis carō nōminī sānctō ejus in saeculum
et benedīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum: et in saeculum saeculī. ^ My mouth shall speak the praise of the Lord
et in saeculum saeculī. ^ I will extol: and let all flesh bless his holy name for ever
